title: Preventative Maintenance Plans
subTitle: Improve efficiency and lifespan with one of our preventative maintenance plans

starterKit.name: Essential Plan
features: Filter Replacement (Standard 1" filters, customer-supplied if special sizes)
System Efficiency Check (includes thermostat check, refrigerant levels, and airflow testing)

professionalToolbox.name: Comfort Plan
features: Filter Replacement (Standard 1" filters, customer-supplied if special sizes)
System Efficiency Check (includes thermostat check, refrigerant levels, and airflow testing)
Unlimited Filter Replacements (upgraded filters included, if needed)
Indoor Air Quality Assessment (includes humidity and pollutant checks)

enterpriseSuite.name: Ultimate Comfort Plan
enterpriseSuite.description: Best for ultimate peace of mind
features: Filter Replacement (Standard 1" filters, customer-supplied if special sizes)
System Efficiency Check (includes thermostat check, refrigerant levels, and airflow testing)
Unlimited Filter Replacements (upgraded filters included, if needed)
Indoor Air Quality Assessment (includes humidity and pollutant checks)
Biannual Duct Inspection and Minor Adjustments
Comprehensive System Calibration (includes detailed performance reporting)
Up to $300 Repair Credit (usable once annually)
Extended Equipment Warranty (terms apply, subject to age of system)
